channel.title: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?
channel.description:
Hey! Thanks for taking your time to read this! :D [size=14pt][u][b]The Base is Project Insanity! [/b][/u][/size] I just want to know how to remove the doors from the Lumbridge Castle
I know how to do it the object manager way but I tried that but it did not work!
So if you could help I would appreciate it! Thanks ^.^

item.title: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

actually thats not what i was talking about, i dont want to get into a arguement but i was talking to the safe spot. The code you gave me wasnt much correct on my server my friend showed me his code on delta and i tested it on pi and it worked. Your good at coding but some times your a lil bit rude but in the end your one of the best coders and wish i can learn as much as you.

Read full topic

so thanks 99matt99!!!

Thanks![/quote]
i did ur offline

and i vain i thats a code from pi some methods that work on delta work on pi thats how i got my pvp wild and my combat level in the wild e.g 3-13 116-126 instead of -7-13 and 116-136…

item.title: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

nono it will be like this

        public void removeObject(int x, int y) {
                object(-1, x, x, 10, 10);
        }
       
        private void objectToRemove(int X, int Y) {
                object(-1, X, Y, 10, 10);
        }

        private void objectToRemove2(int X, int Y) {
                object(-1, X, Y, -1, 0);
        }
       
        public void removeObjects() {
                objectToRemove2(3213, 3221);//door  you will add on to this those are the voids above telling what this command means and what it should do and you where editing those those shouldnt be touch you just add on (objectToRemove) is to remove object on a sqaure (objectToRemove2) is to remove object between squares)

Read full topic
item.source: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?

item.title: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @vivapks vivapks
item.description:
@vivapks wrote:

Lolol kk i got an error D: i replaced the x and y to the door cordinates… This is what i did.

[code]

private void objectToRemove(int X, int Y) {
object(-1, 3213, 3222, 10, 10); // This is for Lumbridge door.
}

public void removeObject(int x, int y) {
	object(-1, 3213, 3221, 10, 10); // This is for Lumbridge door
}[/code]

and this is what i got.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] How do you remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @vivapks vivapks
item.description:
@vivapks wrote:

[quote=“99matt99, post:2, topic:369007”]player assistant

	public void removeObject(int x, int y) {
		object(-1, x, x, 10, 10);
	}
	

	private void objectToRemove(int X, int Y) {
		object(-1, X, Y, 10, 10);
	}

	private void objectToRemove2(int X, int Y) {
		object(-1, X, Y, -1, 0);
	}
	
	public void removeObjects() {
		objectToRemove(x coord, y coord);

click the door and it will give you coords put x the x coord and y coord if its not on a square and between two squares just make it

objectToRemove2(x coord, y coord); [/quote]

All right ill try it and get back to you thanks!

Read full topic

player assistant

	public void removeObject(int x, int y) {
		object(-1, x, x, 10, 10);
	}
	
	private void objectToRemove(int X, int Y) {
		object(-1, X, Y, 10, 10);
	}

	private void objectToRemove2(int X, int Y) {
		object(-1, X, Y, -1, 0);
	}
	
	public void removeObjects() {
		objectToRemove(x coord, y coord);

click the door and it will give you coords put x the x coord and y coord if its not on a square and between two squares just make it

		objectToRemove2(x coord, y coord);
